row.process:
:SET &SQL_FILE#=purge_analytics.sql :PRINT " Purge Analytics, Retention AWA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA#, Retention ARA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA#"
:RESOLVE &PW# = "{VARA.PASSWORD,ANALYTICS,1}"
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off cd &PATH_PSQL_BIN# echo ************************************* echo Purge Analytics, Retention AWA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA#, Retention ARA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# echo &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\psql -e "host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# passwword=*****" < &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo ************************************* echo. !AWA echo select * from AH where ah_timestamp1 ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days' order by ah_timestamp1 desc; > &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH where ah_timestamp1 ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days'; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH_CLEANED where ah_timestamp1 ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days'; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# !ARA echo select * from ara_execution where system_date_changed ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days' order by system_date_changed desc; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from ara_execution where system_date_changed ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days'; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from ara_execution_cleaned where system_date_changed ^< current_date - interval '&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days'; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE#
!Launch &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\psql -e "host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# password='&PW#'" < &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE#
@set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" set +xv cd &PATH_PSQL_BIN# echo "*************************************" echo "Purge Analytics, Retention AWA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA#, Retention ARA: &RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA#" echo "&PATH_PSQL_BIN#/psql -e \"host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# passwword=*****\" < &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE#" echo "*************************************" echo "" !AWA echo select \* from AH where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\' order by ah_timestamp1 desc\; > &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/&SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\'\; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/&SQL_FILE# echo delete from AH_CLEANED where ah_timestamp1 \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_AWA# days\'\; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/&SQL_FILE#
!ARA echo select * from ara_execution where system_date_changed \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days\' order by system_date_changed desc\; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from ara_execution where system_date_changed \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days\'\; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# echo delete from ara_execution_cleaned where system_date_changed \< current_date - interval \'&RETENTION_ANALYTICS_ARA# days\'\; >> &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE#
!Launch &PATH_PSQL_BIN#/psql -e "host=&ANALYTICS_DB_HOST# port=&ANALYTICS_DB_PORT# user=&ANALYTICS_DB_USERNAME# dbname=&ANALYTICS_DB_NAME# password='&PW#'" < &PATH_PSQL_BIN#\&SQL_FILE# rc=$?
exit $rc
:OTHER
:ENDSWITCH
